Articles.Content: Vegetables aren't good for you. It's just a hoax that they created so that they could compete with the companies that make pizza and chocolate milkshakes.
There's a conspiracy to make all people on earth believe in conspiracies.
9/11 and 7/7 where both wrong. they actually crashed a tube from 7/7 into the trade center on 9/11, just the loominaty didn't want us to know that the terrorists could time travel

The Apollo program was fake, the real moon landings used the Mercury capsules and NASA faked the space race to get more cash.

NASA also killed kennedy

ONI did 10/27

Concrete can't break steel

I am so original. [/Halo5]
Space is fake. We are a huge flat bed of land, with a blanket of air.

Ooh! Warm, cuddly air blanket! Buy it today for the low, low price of $19.95! Now with more conspiracies!

and less turtles with planets on their backs.
The V-2's were actually the second of three V class rockets built by Von Braun. The third time traveled and took down the twin towers
In reality there never was a first world war. It was entirely hype, but they needed money for their automobile factories, so they faked it all.
Bin Laden was fake, news media made that up for propaganda.
Kerbals are real and we are just a game they play to pass the time.

The Earth is flat

Earth is not flat. It's as round as a pancake!

Earth is not flat. It's as round as a pancake!

Nope, it's shaped like a burrito.
NASA faked the Moon landings. On Ike.
Loominati. Nuff' said
Our phones are not filled with electronics, but with the tortured souls of....wait WHAT
Scott Manley is teaching us all how to deorbit moons so he can destroy the universe.
Under 50 miles of rock the world [I]IS [/I]Ã¢â‚¬â€¹made of macaroni!
Charlie Chaplin never existed! It's all fake!
Kerbal Space Program is made by satanists who are trying to convince everyone that the Earth isn't flat!

[quote name='SmartS=true']Kerbal Space Program is made by satanists who are trying to convince everyone that the Earth isn't flat![/QUOTE]
I agree that it isn't round, but it isn't flat. it is a warped sphere.

BTW, love the username.
Kerbals never went to Kerbin, it was all faked on Laythe!
Nibiru [B][I]was[/I][/B] the collision that caused the Moon to form!

There is an Egyptian pyramid that is even larger than the Great Pyramid of Giza, but the US Government smuggled it out of Egypt in the 1950s to scare the Soviet Union. It is believed to have been hidden under Mount Rushmore. It is possible that the USSR's missile program was begun in an attempt to destroy this super pyramid, but the Soviet government could never find a good enough reason to launch a missile, especially after the Apollo-Soyuz Test Project, so today it remains hidden under one of our greatest monuments.

100% true, I promise.

[quote name='pTrevTrevs']There is an Egyptian pyramid that is even larger than the Great Pyramid of Giza, but the US Government smuggled it out of Egypt in the 1950s to scare the Soviet Union. It is believed to have been hidden under Mount Rushmore. It is possible that the USSR's missile program was begun in an attempt to destroy this super pyramid, but the Soviet government could never find a good enough reason to launch a missile, especially after the Apollo-Soyuz Test Project, so today it remains hidden under one of our greatest monuments.

100% true, I promise.[/QUOTE]

Speaking of the Egyptians, when the first super-aliens landed on Earth and taught the Egyptians to build pyramids, they brought with them the scourge of the Universe...

[U][B]House Cats....[/B][/U]

Yes, House Cats actually dominated the super aliens centuries earlier, and then came to the Earth with the super aliens.
And in doing, they also enslaved the human race.

Think your not a slave??? Ask a cat owner... hehehe
This is why Cats expect to be worshipped like gods.
